languages.text: "Какие только мерзкие склонности не встречаются у знати. Но пока они не ставят под сомнение верность планеты Империуму, это не стоит приговора".
"The aristocracy is known for its countless reprehensible inclinations. However, unless these foibles give reason to doubt the planet's loyalty to the Imperium, they do not warrant a death sentence."
languages.original_text: "Какие только мерзкие склонности не встречаются у знати. Но пока они не ставят под сомнение верность планеты Империуму, это не стоит приговора".

traits.locale_text: "The aristocracy is known for its innumerable reprehensible inclinations. However, unless these foibles give reason to doubt the planet's loyalty to the Imperium, they do not warrant a death sentence."

"The aristocracy is known for its innumerable reprehensible inclinations. However, unless these foibles give reason to doubt the planet's loyalty to the Imperium, they do not warrant a death sentence."
"The aristocracy is known for its countless reprehensible inclinations. However, unless these foibles give reason to doubt the planet's loyalty to the Imperium, they do not warrant a death sentence."
"The aristocracy is known for its countless reprehensible inclinations. However, unless these foibles give reason to doubt the planet's loyalty to the Imperium, they do not warrant a death sentence."
"The aristocracy is known for its countless reprehensible inclinations. However, unless these foibles give reason to doubt the planet's loyalty to the Imperium, they do not warrant a death sentence."
"The aristocracy is known for its countless reprehensible inclinations. However, unless these foibles give reason to doubt the planet's loyalty to the Imperium, they do not warrant a death sentence."

languages.text: “众所周知，贵族有许多令人鄙夷的癖好与缺点。不过，除非这些问题足以令人怀疑他们对帝国的忠诚，否则死刑并不合适。”
languages.original_text: "The aristocracy is known for its countless reprehensible inclinations. However, unless these foibles give reason to doubt the planet's loyalty to the Imperium, they do not warrant a death sentence."

traits.locale_text: “众所周知，贵族有许多令人鄙夷的癖好与缺点。不过，除非这些问题足以令人怀疑他们对帝国的忠诚，否则死刑并不合适。”

languages.text: «Es bien sabido que la aristocracia tiene muchas inclinaciones lamentables. No obstante, a menos que sus peculiaridades pongan en tela de juicio la lealtad del planeta al Imperium, no merecen una condena a muerte».
languages.original_text: "The aristocracy is known for its countless reprehensible inclinations. However, unless these foibles give reason to doubt the planet's loyalty to the Imperium, they do not warrant a death sentence."

traits.locale_text: «Es bien sabido que la aristocracia tiene muchas inclinaciones lamentables. No obstante, a menos que sus peculiaridades pongan en tela de juicio la lealtad del planeta al Imperium, no merecen una condena a muerte».

languages.text: « L'aristocratie est connue pour ses nombreux penchants répréhensibles. Toutefois, tant que ces marottes ne mettent pas en doute sa loyauté à l'Imperium, il n'est pas nécessaire de recourir à la peine de mort. »
languages.original_text: "The aristocracy is known for its countless reprehensible inclinations. However, unless these foibles give reason to doubt the planet's loyalty to the Imperium, they do not warrant a death sentence."

traits.locale_text: « L'aristocratie est connue pour ses nombreux penchants répréhensibles. Toutefois, tant que ces marottes ne mettent pas en doute sa loyauté à l'Imperium, il n'est pas nécessaire de recourir à la peine de mort. »

languages.text: 「貴族階級には数え切れないほどの嘆かわしい傾向があることで知られています。しかし、そうした欠点が帝国への忠誠に疑念を抱かせるものでない限り、死刑に値するものではありません」
languages.original_text: "The aristocracy is known for its countless reprehensible inclinations. However, unless these foibles give reason to doubt the planet's loyalty to the Imperium, they do not warrant a death sentence."

traits.locale_text: 「貴族階級には数え切れないほどの嘆かわしい傾向があることで知られています。しかし、そうした欠点が帝国への忠誠に疑念を抱かせるものでない限り、死刑に値するものではありません」

languages.text: "Aristokrasi, sayısız rezil eğilimiyle bilinir. Fakat bu zaaflar, gezegenin İmparatorluk'a olan sadakatini sorgulamak için bir sebep sunmuyorsa ölüm cezasını da hak etmezler."
languages.original_text: "The aristocracy is known for its countless reprehensible inclinations. However, unless these foibles give reason to doubt the planet's loyalty to the Imperium, they do not warrant a death sentence."

traits.locale_text: "Aristokrasi, sayısız rezil eğilimiyle bilinir. Fakat bu zaaflar, gezegenin İmparatorluk'a olan sadakatini sorgulamak için bir sebep sunmuyorsa ölüm cezasını da hak etmezler."

languages.text: "Die Aristokratie ist für ihre zahllosen abstoßenden Neigungen bekannt. Doch solange diese Eigenheiten keinen Zweifel an der Loyalität gegenüber dem Imperium rechtfertigen, steht darauf nicht die Todesstrafe."
languages.original_text: "The aristocracy is known for its countless reprehensible inclinations. However, unless these foibles give reason to doubt the planet's loyalty to the Imperium, they do not warrant a death sentence."

traits.locale_text: "Die Aristokratie ist für ihre zahllosen abstoßenden Neigungen bekannt. Doch solange diese Eigenheiten keinen Zweifel an der Loyalität gegenüber dem Imperium rechtfertigen, steht darauf nicht die Todesstrafe."
